timeline.message:
Refactor data termination

List blobs only once and check the whole list of deleted spaces to match
specified filter. Add temporary cleaners of orphaned data which will not
be deleted from Data Termination cleaner

JIRA:LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-2248

timeline.bodyText: Could be replaced by this one-liner: int deletedFiles = IntStream.of(batchResult).sum();
